16210545Di2015UniqueSeparatorBlockingCollection
16210545Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class ParallelWorkProcessor<T> where T: class // T is the work item type.Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public delegate T    Read();           // Called by only one thread.Di2015NewLine    public delegate T    Process(T block); // Called simultaneously by multiple threads.Di2015NewLine    public delegate void Write(T block);   // Called by only one thread.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ParallelWorkProcessor(Read read, Process process, Write write, int numWorkers = 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _read    = read;Di2015NewLine        _process = process;Di2015NewLine        _write   = write;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        numWorkers = (numWorkers > 0) ? numWorkers : Environment.ProcessorCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _workPool    = new SemaphoreSlim(numWorkers*2);Di2015NewLine        _inputQueue  = new BlockingCollection<WorkItem>(numWorkers);Di2015NewLine        _outputQueue = new ConcurrentPriorityQueue<int, T>();Di2015NewLine        _workers     = new Task[numWorkers];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        startWorkers();Di2015NewLine        Task.Factory.StartNew(enqueueWorkItems);Di2015NewLine        _multiplexor = Task.Factory.StartNew(multiplex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void startWorkers()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < _workers.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _workers[i] = Task.Factory.StartNew(processBlocks);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void enqueueWorkItems()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int index = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T data = _read();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (data == null) // Signals end of input.Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _inputQueue.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLine                _outputQueue.Enqueue(index, null); // Special sentinel WorkItem .Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _workPool.Wait();Di2015NewLine            _inputQueue.Add(new WorkItem(data, index++));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void multiplex()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int index = 0; // Next required index.Di2015NewLine        int last = int.MaxValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (index != last)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            KeyValuePair<int, T> workItem;Di2015NewLine            _outputQueue.WaitForNewItem(); // There will always be at least one item - the sentinel item.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while ((index != last) && _outputQueue.TryPeek(out workItem))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (workItem.Value == null) // The sentinel item has a null value to indicate that it's the sentinel.Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    last = workItem.Key;  // The sentinel's key is the index of the last block + 1.Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (workItem.Key == index) // Is this block the next one that we want?Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Even if new items are added to the queue while we're here, the new items will be lower priority.Di2015NewLine                    // Therefore it is safe to assume that the item we will dequeue now is the same one we peeked at.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    _outputQueue.TryDequeue(out workItem);Di2015NewLine                    Contract.Assume(workItem.Key == index); // This *must* be the case.Di2015NewLine                    _workPool.Release();                    // Allow the enqueuer to queue another work item.Di2015NewLine                    _write(workItem.Value);Di2015NewLine                    ++index;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else // If it's not the block we want, we know we'll get a new item at some point.Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _outputQueue.WaitForNewItem();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void processBlocks()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var block in _inputQueue.GetConsumingEnumerable())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var processedData = _process(block.Data);Di2015NewLine            _outputQueue.Enqueue(block.Index, processedData);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool WaitForFinished(int maxMillisecondsToWait) // Can be Timeout.Infinite.Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _multiplexor.Wait(maxMillisecondsToWait);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private sealed class WorkItemDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public WorkItem(T data, int index)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Data  = data;Di2015NewLine            Index = index;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public T   Data  { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public int Index { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly Task[] _workers;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Task _multiplexor;Di2015NewLine    private readonly SemaphoreSlim _workPool;Di2015NewLine    private readonly BlockingCollection<WorkItem> _inputQueue;Di2015NewLine    private readonly ConcurrentPriorityQueue<int, T> _outputQueue;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Read    _read;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Process _process;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Write   _write;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16210545Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace DemoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _rng = new Random(34324);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int threadCount = 8;Di2015NewLine            _maxBlocks = 200;Di2015NewLine            ThreadPool.SetMinThreads(threadCount + 2, 4); // Kludge to prevent slow thread startup.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _numBlocks = _maxBlocks;Di2015NewLine            var stopwatch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine            var processor = new ParallelWorkProcessor<byte[]>(read, process, write, threadCount);Di2015NewLine            processor.WaitForFinished(Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("\\n\\nFinished in " + stopwatch.Elapsed + "\\n\\n");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static byte[] read()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_numBlocks-- == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var result = new byte[128];Di2015NewLine            result[0] = (byte)(_maxBlocks-_numBlocks);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Supplied input: " + result[0]);Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static byte[] process(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (data[0] == 10) // Hack for test purposes. Make it REALLY slow for this item!Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Delaying a call to process() for 5s for ID 10");Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(5000);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(10 + _rng.Next(50));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Processed: " + data[0]);Di2015NewLine            return data;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void write(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Received output: " + data[0]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static Random _rng;Di2015NewLine        private static int _numBlocks;Di2015NewLine        private static int _maxBlocks;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16210545Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Concurrent;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Provides a thread-safe priority queue data structure.</summary> Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TKey">Specifies the type of keys used to prioritize values.</typeparam> Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TValue">Specifies the type of elements in the queue.</typeparam> Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [SuppressMessage("Microsoft.Naming", "CA1711:IdentifiersShouldNotHaveIncorrectSuffix")]Di2015NewLine    [SuppressMessage("Microsoft.Naming", "CA1710:IdentifiersShouldHaveCorrectSuffix")]Di2015NewLine    [DebuggerDisplay("Count={Count}")] Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public sealed class ConcurrentPriorityQueue<TKey, TValue> : Di2015NewLine        IProducerConsumerCollection<KeyValuePair<TKey,TValue>>  Di2015NewLine        where TKey : IComparable<TKey> Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Initializes a new instance of the ConcurrentPriorityQueue class.</summary> Di2015NewLine        public ConcurrentPriorityQueue() {} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Initializes a new instance of the ConcurrentPriorityQueue class that contains elements copied from the specified collection.</summary> Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="collection">The collection whose elements are copied to the new ConcurrentPriorityQueue.</param> Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [SuppressMessage("Microsoft.Design", "CA1006:DoNotNestGenericTypesInMemberSignatures")]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ConcurrentPriorityQueue(IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>> collection) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            if (collection == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("collection"); Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in collection) _minHeap.Insert(item); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Adds the key/value pair to the priority queue.</summary> Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="priority">The priority of the item to be added.</param> Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="value">The item to be added.</param> Di2015NewLine        public void Enqueue(TKey priority, TValue value) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            Enqueue(new KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>(priority, value)); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Adds the key/value pair to the priority queue.</summary> Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="item">The key/value pair to be added to the queue.</param> Di2015NewLine        public void Enqueue(KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue> item) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (_syncLock)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _minHeap.Insert(item);Di2015NewLine                _newItem.Set();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Waits for a new item to appear.</summary>Di2015NewLine        public void WaitForNewItem()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _newItem.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Attempts to remove and return the next prioritized item in the queue.</summary> Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="result"> Di2015NewLine        /// When this method returns, if the operation was successful, result contains the object removed. If Di2015NewLine        /// no object was available to be removed, the value is unspecified. Di2015NewLine        /// </param> Di2015NewLine        /// <returns> Di2015NewLine        /// true if an element was removed and returned from the queue succesfully; otherwise, false. Di2015NewLine        /// </returns> Di2015NewLine        public bool TryDequeue(out KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue> result) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            result = default(KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>); Di2015NewLine            lock (_syncLock) Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                if (_minHeap.Count > 0) Di2015NewLine                { Di2015NewLine                    result = _minHeap.Remove(); Di2015NewLine                    return true; Di2015NewLine                } Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine            return false; Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Attempts to return the next prioritized item in the queue.</summary> Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="result"> Di2015NewLine        /// When this method returns, if the operation was successful, result contains the object. Di2015NewLine        /// The queue was not modified by the operation. Di2015NewLine        /// </param> Di2015NewLine        /// <returns> Di2015NewLine        /// true if an element was returned from the queue succesfully; otherwise, false. Di2015NewLine        /// </returns> Di2015NewLine        public bool TryPeek(out KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue> result) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            result = default(KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>); Di2015NewLine            lock (_syncLock) Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                if (_minHeap.Count > 0) Di2015NewLine                { Di2015NewLine                    result = _minHeap.Peek(); Di2015NewLine                    return true; Di2015NewLine                } Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine            return false; Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Empties the queue.</summary> Di2015NewLine        public void Clear() { lock(_syncLock) _minHeap.Clear(); } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Gets whether the queue is empty.</summary> Di2015NewLine        public bool IsEmpty { get { return Count == 0; } } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Gets the number of elements contained in the queue.</summary> Di2015NewLine        public int Count Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            get { lock (_syncLock) return _minHeap.Count; } Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Copies the elements of the collection to an array, starting at a particular array index.</summary> Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="array"> Di2015NewLine        /// The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the queue. Di2015NewLine        /// </param> Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="index"> Di2015NewLine        /// The zero-based index in array at which copying begins. Di2015NewLine        /// </param> Di2015NewLine        /// <remarks>The elements will not be copied to the array in any guaranteed order.</remarks> Di2015NewLine        public void CopyTo(KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>[] array, int index) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            lock (_syncLock) _minHeap.Items.CopyTo(array, index); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Copies the elements stored in the queue to a new array.</summary> Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>A new array containing a snapshot of elements copied from the queue.</returns> Di2015NewLine        public KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>[] ToArray() Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            lock (_syncLock) Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                var clonedHeap = new MinBinaryHeap(_minHeap); Di2015NewLine                var result = new KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>[_minHeap.Count]; Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < result.Length; i++) Di2015NewLine                { Di2015NewLine                    result[i] = clonedHeap.Remove(); Di2015NewLine                } Di2015NewLine                return result; Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Attempts to add an item in the queue.</summary> Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="item">The key/value pair to be added.</param> Di2015NewLine        /// <returns> Di2015NewLine        /// true if the pair was added; otherwise, false. Di2015NewLine        /// </returns> Di2015NewLine        bool IProducerConsumerCollection<KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>>.TryAdd(KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue> item) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            Enqueue(item); Di2015NewLine            return true; Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Attempts to remove and return the next prioritized item in the queue.</summary> Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="item"> Di2015NewLine        /// When this method returns, if the operation was successful, result contains the object removed. If Di2015NewLine        /// no object was available to be removed, the value is unspecified. Di2015NewLine        /// </param> Di2015NewLine        /// <returns> Di2015NewLine        /// true if an element was removed and returned from the queue succesfully; otherwise, false. Di2015NewLine        /// </returns> Di2015NewLine        bool IProducerConsumerCollection<KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>>.TryTake(out KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue> item) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            return TryDequeue(out item); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.</summary> Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>An enumerator for the contents of the queue.</returns> Di2015NewLine        /// <remarks> Di2015NewLine        /// The enumeration represents a moment-in-time snapshot of the contents of the queue. It does not Di2015NewLine        /// reflect any updates to the collection after GetEnumerator was called. The enumerator is safe to Di2015NewLine        /// use concurrently with reads from and writes to the queue. Di2015NewLine        /// </remarks> Di2015NewLine        public IEnumerator<KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>> GetEnumerator() Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            var arr = ToArray(); Di2015NewLine            return ((IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>>)arr).GetEnumerator(); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.</summary> Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>An IEnumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.</returns> Di2015NewLine        IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() { return GetEnumerator(); } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Copies the elements of the collection to an array, starting at a particular array index.</summary> Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="array"> Di2015NewLine        /// The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the queue. Di2015NewLine        /// </param> Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="index"> Di2015NewLine        /// The zero-based index in array at which copying begins. Di2015NewLine        /// </param> Di2015NewLine        void ICollection.CopyTo(Array array, int index) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            lock (_syncLock) ((ICollection)_minHeap.Items).CopyTo(array, index); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary> Di2015NewLine        /// Gets a value indicating whether access to the ICollection is synchronized with the SyncRoot. Di2015NewLine        /// </summary> Di2015NewLine        bool ICollection.IsSynchronized { get { return true; } } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary> Di2015NewLine        /// Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection. Di2015NewLine        /// </summary> Di2015NewLine        object ICollection.SyncRoot { get { return _syncLock; } } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Implements a binary heap that prioritizes smaller values.</summary> Di2015NewLine        private sealed class MinBinaryHeap Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            private readonly List<KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>> _items; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Initializes an empty heap.</summary> Di2015NewLine            public MinBinaryHeap() Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                _items = new List<KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>>(); Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Initializes a heap as a copy of another heap instance.</summary> Di2015NewLine            /// <param name="heapToCopy">The heap to copy.</param> Di2015NewLine            /// <remarks>Key/Value values are not deep cloned.</remarks> Di2015NewLine            public MinBinaryHeap(MinBinaryHeap heapToCopy) Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                _items = new List<KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>>(heapToCopy.Items); Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Empties the heap.</summary> Di2015NewLine            public void Clear() { _items.Clear(); } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Adds an item to the heap.</summary> Di2015NewLine            public void Insert(KeyValuePair<TKey,TValue> entry) Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                // Add the item to the list, making sure to keep track of where it was added. Di2015NewLine                _items.Add(entry); Di2015NewLine                int pos = _items.Count - 1; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // If the new item is the only item, we're done. Di2015NewLine                if (pos == 0) return; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Otherwise, perform log(n) operations, walking up the tree, swapping Di2015NewLine                // where necessary based on key values Di2015NewLine                while (pos > 0) Di2015NewLine                { Di2015NewLine                    // Get the next position to check Di2015NewLine                    int nextPos = (pos-1) / 2; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Extract the entry at the next position Di2015NewLine                    var toCheck = _items[nextPos]; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Compare that entry to our new one.  If our entry has a smaller key, move it up. Di2015NewLine                    // Otherwise, we're done. Di2015NewLine                    if (entry.Key.CompareTo(toCheck.Key) < 0) Di2015NewLine                    { Di2015NewLine                        _items[pos] = toCheck; Di2015NewLine                        pos = nextPos; Di2015NewLine                    } Di2015NewLine                    else break; Di2015NewLine                } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Make sure we put this entry back in, just in case Di2015NewLine                _items[pos] = entry; Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Returns the entry at the top of the heap.</summary> Di2015NewLine            public KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue> Peek() Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                // Returns the first item Di2015NewLine                if (_items.Count == 0) throw new InvalidOperationException("The heap is empty."); Di2015NewLine                return _items[0]; Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Removes the entry at the top of the heap.</summary> Di2015NewLine            public KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue> Remove() Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                // Get the first item and save it for later (this is what will be returned). Di2015NewLine                if (_items.Count == 0) throw new InvalidOperationException("The heap is empty."); Di2015NewLine                KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue> toReturn = _items[0]; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Remove the first item if there will only be 0 or 1 items left after doing so.   Di2015NewLine                if (_items.Count <= 2) _items.RemoveAt(0); Di2015NewLine                // A reheapify will be required for the removal Di2015NewLine                else Di2015NewLine                { Di2015NewLine                    // Remove the first item and move the last item to the front. Di2015NewLine                    _items[0] = _items[_items.Count - 1]; Di2015NewLine                    _items.RemoveAt(_items.Count - 1); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Start reheapify Di2015NewLine                    int current = 0, possibleSwap = 0; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Keep going until the tree is a heap Di2015NewLine                    while (true) Di2015NewLine                    { Di2015NewLine                        // Get the positions of the node's children Di2015NewLine                        int leftChildPos = 2 * current + 1; Di2015NewLine                        int rightChildPos = leftChildPos + 1; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Should we swap with the left child? Di2015NewLine                        if (leftChildPos < _items.Count) Di2015NewLine                        { Di2015NewLine                            // Get the two entries to compare (node and its left child) Di2015NewLine                            var entry1 = _items[current]; Di2015NewLine                            var entry2 = _items[leftChildPos]; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // If the child has a lower key than the parent, set that as a possible swap Di2015NewLine                            if (entry2.Key.CompareTo(entry1.Key) < 0) possibleSwap = leftChildPos; Di2015NewLine                        } Di2015NewLine                        else break; // if can't swap this, we're done Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Should we swap with the right child?  Note that now we check with the possible swap Di2015NewLine                        // position (which might be current and might be left child). Di2015NewLine                        if (rightChildPos < _items.Count) Di2015NewLine                        { Di2015NewLine                            // Get the two entries to compare (node and its left child) Di2015NewLine                            var entry1 = _items[possibleSwap]; Di2015NewLine                            var entry2 = _items[rightChildPos]; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // If the child has a lower key than the parent, set that as a possible swap Di2015NewLine                            if (entry2.Key.CompareTo(entry1.Key) < 0) possibleSwap = rightChildPos; Di2015NewLine                        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Now swap current and possible swap if necessary Di2015NewLine                        if (current != possibleSwap) Di2015NewLine                        { Di2015NewLine                            var temp = _items[current]; Di2015NewLine                            _items[current] = _items[possibleSwap]; Di2015NewLine                            _items[possibleSwap] = temp; Di2015NewLine                        } Di2015NewLine                        else break; // if nothing to swap, we're done Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Update current to the location of the swap Di2015NewLine                        current = possibleSwap; Di2015NewLine                    } Di2015NewLine                } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Return the item from the heap Di2015NewLine                return toReturn; Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Gets the number of objects stored in the heap.</summary> Di2015NewLine            public int Count { get { return _items.Count; } } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            internal List<KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>> Items { get { return _items; } } Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private readonly AutoResetEvent _newItem = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine        private readonly object _syncLock = new object();Di2015NewLine        private readonly MinBinaryHeap _minHeap = new MinBinaryHeap();Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16212918Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass FStreamDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinestatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const string fileName = "Test#@@#.dat";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create random data to write to the file.Di2015NewLine    byte[] dataArray = new byte[100000];Di2015NewLine    new Random().NextBytes(dataArray);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using(FileStream  Di2015NewLine        fileStream = new FileStream(fileName, FileMode.Create))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Write the data to the file, byte by byte.Di2015NewLine        for(int i = 0; i < dataArray.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fileStream.WriteByte(dataArray[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set the stream position to the beginning of the file.Di2015NewLine        fileStream.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Read and verify the data.Di2015NewLine        for(int i = 0; i < fileStream.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(dataArray[i] != fileStream.ReadByte())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Error writing data.");Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("The data was written to {0} " +Di2015NewLine            "and verified.", fileStream.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16233206Di2015UniqueSeparator[DllImport("msvcrt.dll", EntryPoint = "memcpy", CallingConvention = CallingConvention.Cdecl, SetLastError = false)]Di2015NewLinepublic static extern IntPtr memcpy(IntPtr dest, IntPtr src, UIntPtr count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineunsafe static st[] Read(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var file = File.OpenRead(path))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int size = sizeof(st);Di2015NewLine        const int BLOCK_SIZE = 512; // process at a timeDi2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[BLOCK_SIZE * size];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        UIntPtr bufferLen = new UIntPtr((uint)buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        fixed (byte* bufferPtr = buffer)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Fill(file, buffer, 0, 4);Di2015NewLine            int len = ((int*)bufferPtr)[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            st[] result = new st[len];Di2015NewLine            fixed (st* dataPtr = result)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                st* rawPtr = dataPtr;Di2015NewLine                IntPtr source= new IntPtr(bufferPtr);Di2015NewLine                while (len >= BLOCK_SIZE)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Fill(file, buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                    memcpy(new IntPtr(rawPtr), source, bufferLen);Di2015NewLine                    len -= BLOCK_SIZE;Di2015NewLine                    rawPtr += BLOCK_SIZE;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (len > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Fill(file, buffer, 0, len * size);Di2015NewLine                    memcpy(new IntPtr(rawPtr), source, new UIntPtr((uint)(len * size)));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic void Fill(Stream source, byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int read;Di2015NewLine    while (count > 0 && (read = source.Read(buffer, offset, count)) > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        offset += read;Di2015NewLine        count -= read;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (count > 0) throw new EndOfStreamException();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineunsafe static void Write(st[] data, string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var file = File.Create(path))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int size = sizeof(st);Di2015NewLine        const int BLOCK_SIZE = 512; // process at a timeDi2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[BLOCK_SIZE * size];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int len = data.Length;Di2015NewLine        UIntPtr bufferLen = new UIntPtr((uint)buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        fixed (st* dataPtr = data)Di2015NewLine        fixed (byte* bufferPtr = buffer)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // write the number of elementsDi2015NewLine            ((int*)bufferPtr)[0] = data.Length;Di2015NewLine            file.Write(buffer, 0, 4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            st* rawPtr = dataPtr;Di2015NewLine            IntPtr destination = new IntPtr(bufferPtr);Di2015NewLine            // write complete blocks of BLOCK_SIZEDi2015NewLine            while (len >= BLOCK_SIZE)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                memcpy(destination, new IntPtr(rawPtr), bufferLen);Di2015NewLine                len -= BLOCK_SIZE;Di2015NewLine                rawPtr += BLOCK_SIZE;Di2015NewLine                file.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (len > 0)Di2015NewLine            {   // write an incomplete block, if necessaryDi2015NewLine                memcpy(destination, new IntPtr(rawPtr), new UIntPtr((uint)(len * size)));Di2015NewLine                file.Write(buffer, 0, len * size);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16233996Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void dataGridView1_KeyDown(object sender, KeyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.KeyCode.Equals(Keys.Up))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            moveUp();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (e.KeyCode.Equals(Keys.Down))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            moveDown();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void moveUp()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (dataGridView1.RowCount > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (dataGridView1.SelectedRows.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int rowCount = dataGridView1.Rows.Count;Di2015NewLine                int index = dataGridView1.SelectedCells[0].OwningRow.Index;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (index == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                DataGridViewRowCollection rows = dataGridView1.Rows;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // remove the previous row and add it behind the selected row.Di2015NewLine                DataGridViewRow prevRow = rows[index - 1];Di2015NewLine                rows.Remove(prevRow);Di2015NewLine                prevRow.Frozen = false;Di2015NewLine                rows.Insert(index, prevRow);Di2015NewLine                dataGridView1.ClearSelection();Di2015NewLine                dataGridView1.Rows[index - 1].Selected = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void moveDown()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (dataGridView1.RowCount > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (dataGridView1.SelectedRows.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int rowCount = dataGridView1.Rows.Count;Di2015NewLine                int index = dataGridView1.SelectedCells[0].OwningRow.Index;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (index == (rowCount - 2)) // include the header rowDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                DataGridViewRowCollection rows = dataGridView1.Rows;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // remove the next row and add it in front of the selected row.Di2015NewLine                DataGridViewRow nextRow = rows[index + 1];Di2015NewLine                rows.Remove(nextRow);Di2015NewLine                nextRow.Frozen = false;Di2015NewLine                rows.Insert(index, nextRow);Di2015NewLine                dataGridView1.ClearSelection();Di2015NewLine                dataGridView1.Rows[index + 1].Selected = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16241273Di2015UniqueSeparator public static class ExtDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static IList<KeyValuePair<string, int>> AsOrderColumns<T>(this T t)Di2015NewLine            where T : classDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return t.GetType()Di2015NewLine                    .GetProperties()Di2015NewLine                    .Where(w => w.IsOrderColumn())Di2015NewLine                    .Select(s => s.GetOrderColumn())Di2015NewLine                    .OrderBy(o => o.Value)Di2015NewLine                    .ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static bool IsOrderColumn(this PropertyInfo prop)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return prop.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(DataMemberAttribute), true)Di2015NewLine                       .Any();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static KeyValuePair<string, int> GetOrderColumn(this PropertyInfo prop)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var attr = prop.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(DataMemberAttribute), true)Di2015NewLine                           .ElementAt(0) as DataMemberAttribute;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return (attr != null)Di2015NewLine                ? new KeyValuePair<string, int>(attr.Name, attr.Order)Di2015NewLine                : new KeyValuePair<string, int>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static IList<object> AsOrderRow<T>(this T t)Di2015NewLine            where T : classDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return t.GetType()Di2015NewLine                    .GetProperties()Di2015NewLine                    .Where(w => w.IsOrderColumn())Di2015NewLine                    .OrderBy(o => o.GetOrderColumn().Value)Di2015NewLine                    .Select(s => s.GetValue(t, null))Di2015NewLine                    .ToList();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16242965Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MultiD<T> {Di2015NewLine    private readonly T[] data;Di2015NewLine    private readonly int[] mul;Di2015NewLine    public MultiD(int[] dim) {Di2015NewLine        // Add some validation here:Di2015NewLine        // - Make sure dim has at least one dimensionDi2015NewLine        // - Make sure that all dim's elements are positiveDi2015NewLine        var size = dim.Aggregate(1, (p, v) => p * v);Di2015NewLine        data = new T[size];Di2015NewLine        mul = new int[dim.Length];Di2015NewLine        mul[0] = 1;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i < mul.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine            mul[i] = mul[i - 1] * dim[i - 1];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private int GetIndex(IEnumerable<int> ind) {Di2015NewLine        return ind.Zip(mul, (a, b) => a*b).Sum();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public T this[int[] index] {Di2015NewLine        get { return data[GetIndex(index)]; }Di2015NewLine        set { data[GetIndex(index)] = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16245797Di2015UniqueSeparator        foreach (var tag in pattern.Split(','))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string tg = tag;Di2015NewLine            while (tg.StartsWith(" ")) tg = tg.Remove(0,1);Di2015NewLine            innerList = new List<List<string>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var varyword in tg.Split(' '))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                innerList.Add(varyword.Split('|').ToList<string>());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Adam's codeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            List<String> combinations = new List<String>();Di2015NewLine            int n = innerList.Count;Di2015NewLine            int[] counter = new int[n];Di2015NewLine            int[] max = new int[n];Di2015NewLine            int combinationsCount = 1;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                max[i] = innerList[i].Count;Di2015NewLine                combinationsCount *= max[i];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            int nMinus1 = n - 1;Di2015NewLine            for (int j = combinationsCount; j > 0; j--)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    builder.Append(innerList[i][counter[i]]);Di2015NewLine                    if (i < n - 1) builder.Append(" "); //my addition to insert whitespace between wordsDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                combinations.Add(builder.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                counter[nMinus1]++;Di2015NewLine                for (int i = nMinus1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // overflow checkDi2015NewLine                    if (counter[i] == max[i])Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (i > 0)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            // carry to the leftDi2015NewLine                            counter[i] = 0;Di2015NewLine                            counter[i - 1]++;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //endDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(combinations.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                combinationsList.Add(combinations);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsMatch(string textToCheck)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (combinationsList.Count == 0) return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string t = _caseSensitive ? textToCheck : textToCheck.ToLower();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return combinationsList.All(tg => tg.Any(c => t.Contains(c)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16245901Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinternal static class UsbNotificationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public const int DbtDevicearrival = 0x8000; // system detected a new device        Di2015NewLine    public const int DbtDeviceremovecomplete = 0x8004; // device is gone      Di2015NewLine    public const int WmDevicechange = 0x0219; // device change event      Di2015NewLine    private const int DbtDevtypDeviceinterface = 5;Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Guid GuidDevinterfaceUSBDevice = new Guid("A5DCBF10-6530-11D2-901F-00C04FB951ED"); // USB devicesDi2015NewLine    private static IntPtr notificationHandle;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Registers a window to receive notifications when USB devices are plugged or unplugged.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="windowHandle">Handle to the window receiving notifications.</param>Di2015NewLine    public static void RegisterUsbDeviceNotification(IntPtr windowHandle)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DevBroadcastDeviceinterface dbi = new DevBroadcastDeviceinterfaceDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DeviceType = DbtDevtypDeviceinterface,Di2015NewLine            Reserved = 0,Di2015NewLine            ClassGuid = GuidDevinterfaceUSBDevice,Di2015NewLine            Name = 0Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dbi.Size = Marshal.SizeOf(dbi);Di2015NewLine        IntPtr buffer = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(dbi.Size);Di2015NewLine        Marshal.StructureToPtr(dbi, buffer, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        notificationHandle = RegisterDeviceNotification(windowHandle, buffer, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Unregisters the window for USB device notificationsDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static void UnregisterUsbDeviceNotification()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        UnregisterDeviceNotification(notificationHandle);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Auto, SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    private static extern IntPtr RegisterDeviceNotification(IntPtr recipient, IntPtr notificationFilter, int flags);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    private static extern bool UnregisterDeviceNotification(IntPtr handle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLine    private struct DevBroadcastDeviceinterfaceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        internal int Size;Di2015NewLine        internal int DeviceType;Di2015NewLine        internal int Reserved;Di2015NewLine 16245901Di2015UniqueSeparator    protected override void OnSourceInitialized(EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnSourceInitialized(e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Adds the windows message processing hook and registers USB device add/removal notification.Di2015NewLine        HwndSource source = HwndSource.FromHwnd(new WindowInteropHelper(this).Handle);Di2015NewLine        if (source != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            windowHandle = source.Handle;Di2015NewLine            source.AddHook(HwndHandler);Di2015NewLine            UsbNotification.RegisterUsbDeviceNotification(windowHandle);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Method that receives window messages.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private IntPtr HwndHandler(IntPtr hwnd, int msg, IntPtr wparam, IntPtr lparam, ref bool handled)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (msg == UsbNotification.WmDevicechange)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch ((int)wparam)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case UsbNotification.DbtDeviceremovecomplete:Di2015NewLine                    Usb_DeviceRemoved(); // this is where you do your magicDi2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case UsbNotification.DbtDevicearrival:Di2015NewLine                    Usb_DeviceAdded(); // this is where you do your magicDi2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        handled = false;Di2015NewLine        return IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

redirect input and output from/to files.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// To use this class:Di2015NewLine    /// (1) Create an instance.Di2015NewLine    /// (2) Set the ProgramFileName property if a filename wasn't specified in the constructor.Di2015NewLine    /// (3) Set other properties if required.Di2015NewLine    /// (4) Call Run().Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine                _processStartInfo.Arguments = value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>The working directory set for   return _processStartInfo.WorkingDirectory;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _processStartInfo.WorkingDirectory /// or null or string.Empty to not redirect standard input.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string StandardInputFileNameDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _standardInputFileName = value;Di2015NewLine                _processStartInfo.RedirectStandardInput =      }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The file to be used if standard output is redirected,Di2015NewLine        /// or null or !string.IsNullOrEmpty(value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return _standardOutputFileName;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The file to be used if standard error is redirected,Di2015NewLine        /// or null or      }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregion  // Public PropertiesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Public MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Add a set of name-value pairs into the set of environment variables available to the executable.</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="variables">The name-value pairs to add.</param>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void AddEnvironmentVariables(StringDictionary variables)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (variables == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("variables");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            StringDictionary environmentVariables = _processStartInfo.EnvironmentVariables;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (DictionaryEntry e in variables)Di2015NewLine                environmentVariables[(string)e.Key] = (string)e.Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Run the executable and wait until the it has terminated.</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>The exit code returned from the executable.</returns>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int Run()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Thread standardInputThread  = null;Di2015NewLine            Thread standardOutputThread = null;Di2015NewLine            Thread standardErrorThread  = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _standardInput  = null;Di2015NewLine            _standardError  = null;Di2015NewLine            _standardOutput = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int exitCode = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (Process process = new Process())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    process.StartInfo = _processStartInfo;Di2015NewLine                    process.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (process.StartInfo.RedirectStandardInput)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        _standardInput = process.StandardInput;Di2015NewLine                        standardInputThread = startThread(new ThreadStart(supplyStandardInput), "StandardInput");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (process.StartInfo.RedirectStandardError)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        _standardError = process.StandardError;Di2015NewLine                        standardErrorThread = startThread(new ThreadStart(writeStandardError), "StandardError");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (process.StartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        _standardOutput = process.StandardOutput;Di2015NewLine                        standardOutputThread = startThread(new ThreadStart(writeStandardOutput), "StandardOutput");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    process.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLine                    exitCode = process.ExitCode;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            finally  // Ensure that the threads do not persist beyond the process being runDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (standardInputThread != null)Di2015NewLine                    standardInputThread.Join();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (standardOutputThread != null)Di2015NewLine                    standardOutputThread.Join();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (standardErrorThread != null)Di2015NewLine                    standardErrorThread.Join();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return exitCode;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregion  // Public MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Private MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Start a thread.</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="startInfo">start information for this thread</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="name">name of the thread</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>thread object</returns>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static Thread startThread(ThreadStart startInfo, string name)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Thread t = new Thread(startInfo);Di2015NewLine            t.IsBackground = true ;Di2015NewLine            t.Name = name;Di2015NewLine            t.Start();Di2015NewLine            return t;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Thread which supplies standard input from the appropriate file to the running executable.</summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void supplyStandardInput()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // feed text from the file a line at a time into the standard input streamDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (StreamReader reader = File.OpenText(_standardInputFileName))Di2015NewLine            using (StreamWriter writer = _standardInput)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                writer.AutoFlush = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (;;)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string textLine = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (textLine == null)Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    writer.WriteLine(textLine);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Thread which outputs standard output from the running executable to the appropriate file.</summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void writeStandardOutput()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (StreamWriter writer = File.CreateText(_standardOutputFileName))Di2015NewLine            using (StreamReader reader = _standardOutput)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                writer.AutoFlush = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (;;)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string textLine = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (textLine == null)Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    writer.WriteLine(textLine);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (File.Exists(_standardOutputFileName))Di2015NewLine etc.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (info.Length < 4)Di2015NewLine                    info.Delete();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// 16259566Di2015UniqueSeparator// Also searches up the inheritance hierarchyDi2015NewLineprivate static FieldInfo GetStaticNonPublicFieldInfo(Type type, string name)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    FieldInfo fi;Di2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fi = type.GetField(name, BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLine        type = type.BaseType;Di2015NewLine    } while (fi == null && type != null);Di2015NewLine    return fi;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static object GetControlEventKey(Control c, string eventName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type type = c.GetType();Di2015NewLine    FieldInfo eventKeyField = GetStaticNonPublicFieldInfo(type, "Event" + eventName);Di2015NewLine    if (eventKeyField == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (eventName.EndsWith("Changed"))Di2015NewLine            eventKeyField = GetStaticNonPublicFieldInfo(type, "Event" + eventName.Remove(eventName.Length - 7)); // remove "Changed"Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            eventKeyField = GetStaticNonPublicFieldInfo(type, "EVENT_" + eventName.ToUpper());Di2015NewLine        if (eventKeyField == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Not all events in the WinForms controls use this pattern.Di2015NewLine            // Other methods can be used to search for the event handlers if required.Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return eventKeyField.GetValue(c);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static EventHandlerList GetControlEventHandlerList(Control c)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type type = c.GetType();Di2015NewLine    PropertyInfo pi = type.GetProperty("Events",Di2015NewLine       BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine    return (EventHandlerList)pi.GetValue(c, null);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16259566Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void tb_LostFocus(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TextBox tb = (TextBox)sender;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var eventList = GetControlEventHandlerList(tb);Di2015NewLine    var eventKey = GetControlEventKey(tb, "TextChanged");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Remove the handlersDi2015NewLine    var handlers = eventList[eventKey];Di2015NewLine    eventList.RemoveHandler(eventKey, handlers);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ... perform your taskDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Reattach the handlersDi2015NewLine    eventList.AddHandler(eventKey, handlers);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16259942Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class agginit{internal static bool started=false;}Di2015NewLinepublic class agg<T>{Di2015NewLine    //public static T add(T a,T b){return a+b;} // compile error: Operator '+' cannot be applied to operands of type 'T' and 'T'Di2015NewLine    //public static T add(T a,T b){return (dynamic)a+b;} // compiles, but involves boxing and unboxing at run-timeDi2015NewLine    //public static int add(int a,int b){return a+b;} // won't be matched by test agg<T>.add(a,b) invokationDi2015NewLine    public static T add(T a,T b){return _add(a,b);}Di2015NewLine    static Func<T,T,T> _add=null;Di2015NewLine    public static void setAdd(Func<T,T,T> f){if(_add==null)_add=f;else throw new Exception("Can't init twice");}Di2015NewLine    static agg(){Di2015NewLine        if(!agginit.started){ // to prevent recursive actionsDi2015NewLine            agginit.started=true;Di2015NewLine            agg<int>._add=(a,b)=>a+b;Di2015NewLine            agg<double>._add=(a,b)=>a+b;Di2015NewLine            // below we initialize all other potentially used additive types just for fun, if type is not listed here, it's not supportedDi2015NewLine            agg<string>._add=(a,b)=>a+b;Di2015NewLine            agg<byte>._add=(a,b)=>{return (byte)(a+b);}; // dirty down-cast, needs to be enhanced with return type generic parameterDi2015NewLine            agg<long>._add=(a,b)=>a+b;Di2015NewLine            agg<System.Numerics.BigInteger>._add=(a,b)=>a+b;Di2015NewLine            agg<StringBuilder>._add=(a,b)=>{var ret=new StringBuilder();ret.Append(a.ToString());ret.Append(b.ToString());return ret;};Di2015NewLine            agg<IEnumerable<T>>._add=(a,b)=>a.Concat(b);Di2015NewLine            agg<HashSet<T>>._add=(a,b)=>{var ret=new HashSet<T>(a);ret.UnionWith(b);return ret;};Di2015NewLine            agg<SortedSet<T>>._add=(a,b)=>{var ret=new SortedSet<T>(a);ret.UnionWith(b);return ret;};Di2015NewLine            agg<byte[]>._add=(a,b)=>{var ret=new byte[a.Length+b.Length];Buffer.BlockCopy(a,0,ret,0,a.Length);Buffer.BlockCopy(b,0,ret,a.Length,b.Length); return ret;};Di2015NewLine            agg<System.IO.MemoryStream>._add=(a,b)=>{var ret=new System.IO.MemoryStream(new byte[a.Length+b.Length]);a.WriteTo(ret);b.WriteTo(ret);return ret;};Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class test<T>{Di2015NewLine    public T res;Di2015NewLine    public test(T a,T b){Di2015NewLine        res=agg<T>.add(a,b);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class A{Di2015NewLine    public int z;Di2015NewLine    static A(){Di2015NewLine        agg<A>.setAdd((a,b)=>new A{z=a.z+b.z}); // any class can define own add implementationDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void test(){Di2015NewLine        var t1=agg<A>.add(new A{z=1},new A{z=2});Di2015NewLine        if(t1.z!=3)throw new Exception("test failed");Di2015NewLine        var t2=new test<A>(new A{z=1},new A{z=2});Di2015NewLine        if(t2.res.z!=3)throw new Exception("test failed");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16263026Di2015UniqueSeparatorBigInteger
16263026Di2015UniqueSeparatorPow
16263026Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static BigInteger Pow (BigInteger value, int exponent)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (exponent < 0)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("exponent", "exp must be >= 0");Di2015NewLine    if (exponent == 0)Di2015NewLine        return One;Di2015NewLine    if (exponent == 1)Di2015NewLine        return value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    BigInteger result = One;Di2015NewLine    while (exponent != 0) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((exponent & 1) != 0)Di2015NewLine            result = result * value;Di2015NewLine        if (exponent == 1)Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        value = value * value;Di2015NewLine        exponent >>= 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

value });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Rebuild()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Items.Clear();Di2015NewLine        if (_value != null)Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void EnumEditor_ItemCheck(object sender, ItemCheckEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ulong bits = Convert.ToUInt64(_value);Di2015NewLine        ulong 16265882Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Vector? Intersects(Point a1, Point a2, Point b1, Point b2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Vector b = a2 - a1;Di2015NewLine        Vector d = b2 - b1;Di2015NewLine        var bDotDPerp = b.X * d.Y - b.Y * d.X;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (bDotDPerp == 0)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Vector c = b1 - a1;Di2015NewLine        var t = (c.X * d.Y - c.Y * d.X) / bDotDPerp;Di2015NewLine        if (t < 0 || t > 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var u = (c.X * b.Y - c.Y * b.X) / bDotDPerp;Di2015NewLine        if (u < 0 || u > 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new Vector(a1.X, a1.Y) + t * b;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16266127Di2015UniqueSeparator// this is sample C# console application Di2015NewLineusing System.Data;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace SODi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DataTable dt = GetTable();Di2015NewLine            // get list of Data Table column names like A, B, C, D...Di2015NewLine            var columnNames = (from DataColumn col in dt.ColumnsDi2015NewLine                               select col.ColumnName).ToList();Di2015NewLine            // compute sum for each column and get list of objects which having sum and column name as property. Di2015NewLine            var computed = columnNames.Select(c => new { ColumnName = c, Sum = dt.Compute(string.Format("Sum({0})", c), "") }).OrderByDescending(p => p.Sum).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // set the column position based on Sum of the column Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < computed.Count(); i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dt.Columns[computed[i].ColumnName].SetOrdinal(i);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // testing I have added this method to create Data Table with testing dataDi2015NewLine        static DataTable GetTable()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DataTable table = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine            table.Columns.Add("A", typeof(int));Di2015NewLine            table.Columns.Add("B", typeof(int));Di2015NewLine            table.Columns.Add("C", typeof(int));Di2015NewLine            table.Columns.Add("D", typeof(int));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            table.Rows.Add(1, 0, 0, 1);Di2015NewLine            table.Rows.Add(0, 0, 0, 1);Di2015NewLine            table.Rows.Add(1, 1, 0, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return table;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16267630Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class QueryableExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IQueryable<T> Search<T>(this IQueryable<T> source, Expression<Func<T, string>> stringProperty, params string[] searchTerms)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!searchTerms.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return source;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Expression orExpression = null;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var searchTerm in searchTerms)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Create expression to represent x.[property].Contains(searchTerm)Di2015NewLine            var searchTermExpression = Expression.Constant(searchTerm);Di2015NewLine            var containsExpression = BuildContainsExpression(stringProperty, searchTermExpression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            orExpression = BuildOrExpression(orExpression, containsExpression);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var completeExpression = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(orExpression, stringProperty.Parameters);Di2015NewLine        return source.Where(completeExpression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Expression BuildOrExpression(Expression existingExpression, Expression expressionToAdd)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (existingExpression == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return expressionToAdd;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Build 'OR' expression for each propertyDi2015NewLine        return Expression.OrElse(existingExpression, expressionToAdd);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static MethodCallExpression BuildContainsExpression<T>(Expression<Func<T, string>> stringProperty, ConstantExpression searchTermExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Call(stringProperty.Body, typeof(string).GetMethod("Contains"), searchTermExpression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16267630Di2015UniqueSeparator[HttpGet]Di2015NewLinepublic JsonResult searchForSwimmers(string q)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //designed to return [{name='foo',id='bar'}]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    String[] QueryTerms = q.Split(' '); //all the search terms are sep. by " "Di2015NewLine    var groupResults = _db.SwimGroups.Search(g => g.Name, queryTerms) Di2015NewLine                                     .OrderByDescending(g => g.Name.StartsWithAny(QueryTerms) ? 1 : 0)Di2015NewLine                                     .ThenBy( g => g)Di2015NewLine                                     .Select(g => new { name = g.Name, id = g.ID });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Json(groupResults,JsonRequestBehavior.AllowGet);Di2015NewLine}    Di2015NewLine

16268317Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string PostToImgur(string imagFilePath, string apiKey)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] imageData;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    FileStream fileStream = File.OpenRead(imagFilePath);Di2015NewLine    imageData = new byte[fileStream.Length];Di2015NewLine    fileStream.Read(imageData, 0, imageData.Length);Di2015NewLine    fileStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const int MAX_URI_LENGTH = 32766;Di2015NewLine    string base64img = System.Convert.ToBase64String(imageData);Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < base64img.Length; i += MAX_URI_LENGTH)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(Uri.EscapeDataString(base64img.Substring(i, Math.Min(MAX_URI_LENGTH, base64img.Length - i))));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string uploadRequestString = "key=" + apiKey + "&title=" + "imageTitle" +Di2015NewLine        "&caption=" + "img" + "&image=" + sb.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // string uploadRequestString = "image=" + Uri.EscapeDataString(System.Convert.ToBase64String(imageData)) + "&key=" + apiKey;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest webRequest = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create("https://api.imgur.com/3/image");Di2015NewLine    webRequest.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine    webRequest.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine    webRequest.ServicePoint.Expect100Continue = false;Di2015NewLine    webRequest.Headers["Authorization"] = "Client-ID abd937cc5e11dc9";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StreamWriter streamWriter = new StreamWriter(webRequest.GetRequestStream());Di2015NewLine    streamWriter.Write(uploadRequestString);Di2015NewLine    streamWriter.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    WebResponse response = webRequest.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine    Stream responseStream = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine    StreamReader responseReader = new StreamReader(responseStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return responseReader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string dateString = "Invalid Date";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var TryResult<DateTime>.Failure();Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryParseDateTask.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (tryParseDateTask.Result.IsSuccessful)Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(dateString + " was parsed OK.");Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(dateString + " was parsed as " + tryParseDateTask.Result.Value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class TryResult<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static TryResult<T> Success(T value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new TryResult<T>(value, true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static TryResult<T> Failure()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new TryResult<T>(default(T), false);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TryResult(T value, bool isSuccessful)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.value = value;Di2015NewLine            this.isSuccessful = isSuccessful;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public T ValueDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool IsSuccessfulDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return isSuccessful;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        readonly T value;Di2015NewLine        readonly bool isSuccessful;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16282169Di2015UniqueSeparator[Test]Di2015NewLinepublic void ReplaceInstance_can_proxy_for_interface_type_when_using_multi_stage_registration()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var builder = new ContainerBuilder();Di2015NewLine    builder.RegisterType<Sample>().AsSelf();Di2015NewLine    builder.Register(c => (ISample)c.Resolve<Sample>())Di2015NewLine           .OnActivating(x => x.ReplaceInstance(new ProxiedSample(x.Instance)))Di2015NewLine           .SingleInstance();Di2015NewLine    var container = builder.Build();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var sample = container.Resolve<ISample>();Di2015NewLine    Assert.That(sample, Is.InstanceOf<ProxiedSample>());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16282362Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<byte[]> Split(byte[] bArray)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<byte[]> result = new List<byte[]>();Di2015NewLine            List<byte> tmp = new List<byte>();Di2015NewLine            int i, n = bArray.Length;Di2015NewLine            for (i = 0; i < n; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (bArray[i] == 0x13 && (i + 1 < n && bArray[i + 1] == 0x10))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result.Add(tmp.ToArray());Di2015NewLine                    tmp.Clear();Di2015NewLine                    i++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    tmp.Add(bArray[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (tmp.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                result.Add(tmp.ToArray());Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

16283166Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void WaitForElementToNotExist(string ID, IWebDriver driver)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    WebDriverWait wait = new WebDriverWait(driver, TimeSpan.FromSeconds(10));Di2015NewLine    wait.Until<bool>((d) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If the find succeeds, the element exists, andDi2015NewLine            // we want the element to *not* exist, so we wantDi2015NewLine            // to return true when the find throws an exception.Di2015NewLine            IWebElement element = d.FindElement(By.Id(ID));Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (NoSuchElementException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16283166Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void WaitForElementInvisible(string ID, IWebDriver driver)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    WebDriverWait wait = new WebDriverWait(driver, TimeSpan.FromSeconds(10));Di2015NewLine    wait.Until<bool>((d) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IWebElement element = d.FindElement(By.Id(ID));Di2015NewLine            return !element.Displayed;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (NoSuchElementException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If the find fails, the element exists, andDi2015NewLine            // by definition, cannot then be visible.Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16283193Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ConvertToChunks()  Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Open fileDi2015NewLine    string file = MapPath("~/temp/1.xps");Di2015NewLine    FileStream fileStream = new FileStream(file, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLine    //Chunk size that will be sent to ServerDi2015NewLine    int chunkSize = 1024;Di2015NewLine    // Unique file nameDi2015NewLine    string fileName = Guid.NewGuid() + Path.GetExtension(file);Di2015NewLine    int totalChunks = (int)Math.Ceiling((double)fileStream.Length / chunkSize);Di2015NewLine    // Loop through the whole stream and send it chunk by chunk;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < totalChunks; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int startIndex = i * chunkSize;Di2015NewLine        int endIndex = (int)(startIndex + chunkSize > fileStream.Length ?   fileStream.Length : startIndex + chunkSize);Di2015NewLine        int length = endIndex - startIndex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] bytes = new byte[length];Di2015NewLine        fileStream.Read(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine        ChunkRequest(fileName, bytes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void ChunkRequest(string fileName,byte[] buffer)  Di2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLine    //Request url, Method=post Length and data.Di2015NewLine    string requestURL = "http://localhost:63654/hello.ashx";Di2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(requestURL);Di2015NewLine    request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine    request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Chunk(buffer) is converted to Base64 string that will be convert to Bytes on  the handler.Di2015NewLine    string requestParameters = @"fileName=" + fileName + "&data=" + HttpUtility.UrlEncode( Convert.ToBase64String(buffer) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // finally whole request will be converted to bytes that will be transferred to HttpHandlerDi2015NewLine    byte[] byteData = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(requestParameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    request.ContentLength = byteData.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Stream writer = request.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLine    writer.Write(byteData, 0, byteData.Length);Di2015NewLine    writer.Close();Di2015NewLine    // here we will receive the response from HttpHandlerDi2015NewLine    StreamReader stIn = new StreamReader(request.GetResponse().GetResponseStream());Di2015NewLine    string strResponse = stIn.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine    stIn.Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16283212Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EnumerableExtensions {Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<T> InARow<T>(this IEnumerable<T> list, Di2015NewLine                                    Predicate<T> filter, int length) {Di2015NewLine        int run = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (T element in list) {Di2015NewLine            if (filter(element)) {Di2015NewLine                if (++run >= length) return true;Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine            else {Di2015NewLine                run = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
