16283350Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary> Finds the most derived common base class of all the provided types, or System.Object if there is no common base class  </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static Type CommonBaseClass(params Type[] types)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(ReferenceEquals(types,null)) return typeof(object);Di2015NewLine        types = types.Where(x => !ReferenceEquals(x,null)).Distinct().ToArray();Di2015NewLine        switch (types.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case 0: return typeof(object);Di2015NewLine            case 1: return types[0].IsInterface ? typeof(object): types[0];Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                IEnumerable<IEnumerable<Type>> hierarchies = types.Select(ClassHierarchy).OrderBy(x => x.Count());Di2015NewLine                Queue<Type> smallest = new Queue<Type>(hierarchies.First().Reverse());Di2015NewLine                hierarchies = hierarchies.Skip(1);Di2015NewLine                doDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int maxPossible = smallest.Count;Di2015NewLine                    hierarchies = hierarchies.Select(each => each.Take(maxPossible));Di2015NewLine                    Type candidate = smallest.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                    if (hierarchies.All(each => each.Last() == candidate))Di2015NewLine                        return candidate;Di2015NewLine                } while (smallest.Count > 1);Di2015NewLine                return typeof(object);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ///<summary>Gets the class hierarchy of the provided type, in order of derivation, e.g. : (System.Object,CustomBaseType,CustomConcreteType,...), or the singleton of System.Object type if the provided type is an interface or null </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<Type> ClassHierarchy(this Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (type == null || type.IsInterface) type = typeof(object);Di2015NewLine        var stack = new Stack<Type>();Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            stack.Push(type);Di2015NewLine            type = type.BaseType;Di2015NewLine        } while (type != null);Di2015NewLine        return stack;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16288001Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ForcedImplementationSelector<TService> : IHandlerSelectorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<Type, Type>  _forcedImplementation = new Dictionary<Type, Type>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void ForceTo<T>() where T: TServiceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _forcedImplementation[typeof(TService)] = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void ClearForce()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _forcedImplementation[typeof(TService)] = null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool HasOpinionAbout(string key, Type service)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return service == typeof (TService);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IHandler SelectHandler(string key, Type service, IHandler[] handlers)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var tService = typeof(TService);Di2015NewLine        if (_forcedImplementation.ContainsKey(tService) && _forcedImplementation[tService] != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return handlers.FirstOrDefault(handler => handler.ComponentModel.Implementation == _forcedImplementation[tService]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // return defaultDi2015NewLine        return handlers[0];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16298412Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void ProcessRequest(HttpContext context)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(context.Request.QueryString[_QUERY_PARAM]))Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception(string.Format("Could not find parameter '{0}'", _QUERY_PARAM));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get the suggestion word from the parameterDi2015NewLine    string term = context.Request.QueryString[_QUERY_PARAM];Di2015NewLine    // Create an URL to the GSADi2015NewLine    string suggestionUrl = SuggestionUrl(term);Di2015NewLine    // Call the GSA and get the GSA result as a stringDi2015NewLine    string page = GetPageAsString(suggestionUrl);Di2015NewLine    context.Response.Write(page);Di2015NewLine    //Should inform about the content type to clientDi2015NewLine    context.Response.ContentType = "application/json";Di2015NewLine    context.Response.End();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16298412Di2015UniqueSeparator$(function () {Di2015NewLine    var cache = {};Di2015NewLine    $("#programmes").autocomplete({Di2015NewLine        minLength: 2,Di2015NewLine        source: function (request, response) {Di2015NewLine            var term = request.term;Di2015NewLine            if (term in cache) {Di2015NewLine                response(cache[term]);Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            $.getJSON("/Suggest.ashx", request, function(data, status, xhr) {Di2015NewLine                var suggestions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                suggestions = $.map(data.results, function(item) {Di2015NewLine                    return { label: item.name, value: item.name };Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine                cache[term] = suggestions;Di2015NewLine                response(suggestions);Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLine

inDi2015NewLine                DriveInfo.GetDrives().Where(driveInfo => driveInfo.DriveType.Equals(DriveType.CDRom)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _drives.Add(drive.Name, true;Di2015NewLine                foreach (DriveInfo drive in from drive in DriveInfo.GetDrives()Di2015NewLine                                            where 16298555Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic ServiceHost[] serviceHost = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyService()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnStart(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Get path for the executing assembllyDi2015NewLine            string exePath = Path.GetDirectoryName(Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().Location);Di2015NewLine            //Path to the dlls to be hostedDi2015NewLine            string filePath = exePath + "\\\\DLLsToHost\\\\";Di2015NewLine            //Retrieve only dll files from the folderDi2015NewLine            string[] files = Directory.GetFiles(@filePath, "*.dll");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //get the dll file namesDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                files[i] = Path.GetFileName(files[i]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //create an array of ServiceHost typeDi2015NewLine            serviceHost = new ServiceHost[files.Length];Di2015NewLine            //get the base address for the services from config fileDi2015NewLine            string address = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["baseAddress"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int j = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var dllName in files)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string dllPath = filePath + dllName;Di2015NewLine                //Load the dllDi2015NewLine                Assembly assembly = Assembly.LoadFrom(@dllPath);Di2015NewLine                //Get the class name implementing the serviceDi2015NewLine                string serviceName = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings[dllName];Di2015NewLine                //get the interface name implemented by the classDi2015NewLine                string interfaceName = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["I" + dllName];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (serviceName == null || interfaceName == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Logging.trace(System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel.Error,Di2015NewLine                        "Configuration settings for " + dllName + " are not proper. "+Di2015NewLine                        "The name of the class implementing the service should be defined with the key value as '"+dllName+"' and" +Di2015NewLine                    "The name of the interface should be defined with the key value as 'I"+dllName+"'.", "OnStart()");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Get the class implementing the serviceDi2015NewLine                    Type service = assembly.GetType(serviceName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (service != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //Get the interface implemented by the classDi2015NewLine                        Type contract = service.GetInterface(interfaceName, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (contract != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            //Create   if (serviceHost[j] != null)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                serviceHost[j].Close();Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            serviceHost[j] = new CustomServiceHost(service, baseAddress);Di2015NewLine                            //add the service endpoint and contractDi2015NewLine                            ServiceEndpoint sEP = serviceHost[j].AddServiceEndpoint(contract, new WebHttpBinding(), "");Di2015NewLine                            WebHttpBehavior webHttpBeh = sEP.Behaviors.Find<WebHttpBehavior>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            //Set the service and endpoint behavioursDi2015NewLine                            if (webHttpBeh != null)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                webHttpBeh.AutomaticFormatSelectionEnabled = true;Di2015NewLine true;Di2015NewLine                                newWebHttpBeh.DefaultOutgoingResponseFormat = WebMessageFormat.Json;Di2015NewLine                                newWebHttpBeh.HelpEnabled = supportDi2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            serviceHost[j].Open();Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine service for " + dllName, "OnStart()");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                j++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine 16302995Di2015UniqueSeparator        private void AdjustPanels(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        double desiredAspectRatio = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // I am using the form itself as a reference to the size and aspect ration of the application.Di2015NewLine        // you can, of course, use any other control instead (e.g. a panel where you stuff all the other panelsDi2015NewLine        int width = this.Width;Di2015NewLine        int height = this.Height;Di2015NewLine        double formAspectRatio = (double)width / (double)height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int marginLeft=0, marginRight=0, marginTop=0, marginBottom=0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (desiredAspectRatio > formAspectRatio)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // high aspect ratios mean a wider picture -> the picture we want is wider than what it currently isDi2015NewLine            // so we will need a margin on top and bottomDi2015NewLine            marginLeft = 0; marginRight = 0;Di2015NewLine            marginTop = (int)((height - desiredAspectRatio * width) / 2);Di2015NewLine            marginBottom = (int)((height - desiredAspectRatio * width) / 2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            marginTop = 0; marginBottom = 0;Di2015NewLine            marginLeft = (int)((width - desiredAspectRatio*height)/2);Di2015NewLine            marginRight = (int)((width - desiredAspectRatio * height) / 2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        pnlTop.Height = marginTop;Di2015NewLine        pnlBottom.Height = marginBottom;Di2015NewLine        pnlLeft.Width = marginLeft;Di2015NewLine        pnlRight.Width = marginRight;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16307106Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> GroupWhile<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, bool> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var iterator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<T> list = new List<T>() { iterator.Current };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (predicate(iterator.Current))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                list.Add(iterator.Current);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return list;Di2015NewLine                list = new List<T>() { iterator.Current };Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield return list;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16307879Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic WindowsImpersonationContext Di2015NewLine    ImpersonateUser(string sUsername, string sDomain, string sPassword)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // initialize System.Environment.MachineName;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string sResult = null;Di2015NewLine        const int LOGON32_PROVIDER_DEFAULT = 0;Di2015NewLine        // pExistingTokenHandle);Di2015NewLine        // did impersonation fail?Di2015NewLine        if (false == bImpersonated)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int nErrorCode = // Get identity before impersonationDi2015NewLine        sResult += "Before impersonation: " + Di2015NewLine            WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent().Name + "\\r\\n";Di2015NewLine        bool bRetVal = DuplicateToken(pExistingTokenHandle, Di2015NewLine            (int)SECURITY_IMPERSONATION_LEVEL.SecurityImpersonation, Di2015NewLine                ref pDuplicateTokenHandle);Di2015NewLine        // did DuplicateToken fail?Di2015NewLine        if (false == bRetVal)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int nErrorCode = Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLine            // close existing handleDi2015NewLine            CloseHandle(pExistingTokenHandle); Di2015NewLine            sResult += "DuplicateToken() failed with error code: " Di2015NewLine                + nErrorCode + "\\r\\n";Di2015NewLine            // show the reason why DuplicateToken failedDi2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show(this, sResult, "Error", Di2015NewLine                MessageBoxButtons.OK, Di2015NewLine                MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Information);Di2015NewLine            return impersonatedUser;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch Di2015NewLine        if (x.WorkgroupId == y.WorkgroupId && x.AreaId == y.AreaId) Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;                        Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(TrainingPlan trainingPlan)Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(trainingPlan, null)) 16315567Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class MySqlMethodsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static bool Like(string matchExpression, string pattern)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Your implementationDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ChangeMethodsVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //This method will change SqlMethods to MySqlMethods.Di2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitMethodCall(MethodCallExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (node.Method.DeclaringType == typeof(SqlMethods))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Getting method from MySqlMethods class.Di2015NewLine            var method = typeof(MySqlMethods).GetMethod(node.Method.Name,Di2015NewLine                                                         node.Method.GetParameters()Di2015NewLine                                                             .Select(info => info.ParameterType)Di2015NewLine                                                             .ToArray());Di2015NewLine            return Expression.Call(method, node.Arguments);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return base.VisitMethodCall(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyQueryProvider : IQueryProviderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly ExpressionVisitor ExpressionVisitor = new ChangeMethodsVisitor();Di2015NewLine    private readonly IQueryProvider _queryProvider;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyQueryProvider(IQueryProvider queryProvider)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _queryProvider = queryProvider;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IQueryable CreateQuery(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        expression = ExpressionVisitor.Visit(expression);Di2015NewLine        var queryable = _queryProvider.CreateQuery(expression);Di2015NewLine        //Wrap queryable to MyQuery class.Di2015NewLine        var makeGenericType = typeof(MyQuery<>).MakeGenericType(queryable.ElementType);Di2015NewLine        return (IQueryable)makeGenericType.GetConstructor(new[] { typeof(IQueryable<>).MakeGenericType(queryable.ElementType) })Di2015NewLine                                           .Invoke(new object[] { queryable });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IQueryable<TElement> CreateQuery<TElement>(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        expression = ExpressionVisitor.Visit(expression);Di2015NewLine        //Wrap queryable to MyQuery class.Di2015NewLine        var queryable = _queryProvider.CreateQuery<TElement>(expression);Di2015NewLine        return new MyQuery<TElement>(queryable);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object Execute(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        expression = ExpressionVisitor.Visit(expression);Di2015NewLine        return _queryProvider.Execute(expression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TResult Execute<TResult>(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        expression = ExpressionVisitor.Visit(expression);Di2015NewLine        return _queryProvider.Execute<TResult>(expression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyQuery<T> : IOrderedQueryable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly IQueryable<T> _queryable;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyQuery(IQueryable<T> queryable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _queryable = queryable;Di2015NewLine        Provider = new MyQueryProvider(_queryable.Provider);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyQuery(IEnumerable<T> enumerable)Di2015NewLine        : this(enumerable.AsQueryable())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<T> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _queryable.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine 16322686Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<IEnumerable<int>> getCoins(int price, int prev_coin)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int[] coinValues = new int[] { 1, 2, 5, 10, 20, 50, 100, 200 }; // Coin valuesDi2015NewLine    if (coinValues.Contains(price)) yield return new int[] { price }; // If the price can be represented be a single coinDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // For every coin that is smaller than the price, take it away, call the function recursively and concatenate it laterDi2015NewLine    foreach (int coin in coinValues.Where(x => (x < price && x <= prev_coin)))Di2015NewLine        foreach (IEnumerable<int> match in getCoins(price - coin, coin))Di2015NewLine            yield return match.Concat(new int[] { coin });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16323483Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int IndexOfMin(this IList<int> self)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (self == null) {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("self");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (self.Count == 0) {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("List is empty.", "self");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int min = self[0];Di2015NewLine    int minIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < self.Count; ++i) {Di2015NewLine        if (self[i] < min) {Di2015NewLine            min = self[i];Di2015NewLine            minIndex = i;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return minIndex;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16327735Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string MergeXml(string xml1, string xml2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    XslCompiledTransform xslt = new XslCompiledTransform();Di2015NewLine    XmlDocument xsltDoc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine    // Load the XSLT file through XmlReader to override the base URI.Di2015NewLine    using( StreamReader reader = File.OpenText(HttpContext.Current.Server.MapPath("transform.xslt")) )Di2015NewLine    using( XmlReader xmlReader = XmlReader.Create(reader, null, "file:///transform.xslt") )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        xsltDoc.Load(xmlReader);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Use XsltSettings to enable the use of the document() function.Di2015NewLine    xslt.Load(xsltDoc, new XsltSettings(true, false), null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Load the first XML file into a documentDi2015NewLine    XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine    doc.LoadXml(xml1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create the resolver and add the second file to it.Di2015NewLine    XmlPreloadedResolver resolver = new XmlPreloadedResolver();Di2015NewLine    resolver.Add(new Uri("file:///file2.xml"), xml2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using( StringWriter writer = new StringWriter() )Di2015NewLine    using( XmlWriter xmlWriter = XmlWriter.Create(writer) )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Pass the resolver to the transformDi2015NewLine        xslt.Transform(doc, null, xmlWriter, resolver);Di2015NewLine        return writer.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16336070Di2015UniqueSeparator                                            |                   |Di2015NewLine                                            | ByVal (neither    |  ByRef (ref orDi2015NewLine                                            | ref nor out):     |  out keyword):Di2015NewLine                                            |                   |Di2015NewLine--------------------------------------------+-------------------+----------------------Di2015NewLinevalue type (struct, enum)                   | entire object     |  no copy, argumentDi2015NewLine                                            | is COPIED         |  must be a variable,Di2015NewLine                                            |                   |  same variable usedDi2015NewLine--------------------------------------------+-------------------+----------------------Di2015NewLinereference type (class, interface, delegate) | reference COPIED; |  no copy, argumentDi2015NewLine                                            | NEW reference to  |  must be a variable,Di2015NewLine                                            | same object       |  same variable usedDi2015NewLine--------------------------------------------+-------------------+----------------------Di2015NewLine

16341212Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //public delegate int SomeDelegate(int x);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("This is the CallBack Pattern Technique for Asynchronous Delegates in Threading");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("");Di2015NewLine            Func<int,int> sd = SquareNumber;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("[{0}] Before SquareNumber Method invoked.", Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId);Di2015NewLine            IAsyncResult asyncRes = sd.BeginInvoke(10, new AsyncCallback(CallbackMethod), null);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("[{0}] Back in Main after SquareNumber Method invoked. Doing Extra Processing.", Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("[{0}] Main method processing completed.", Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId);Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static int SquareNumber(int a)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("[{0}] Inside SquareNumber  - invoked. Processing......", Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId);Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(5000);Di2015NewLine            return a * a;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void CallbackMethod(IAsyncResult asyncRes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("[{0}] Callback Invoked", Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId);Di2015NewLine            AsyncResult ares = (AsyncResult)asyncRes;Di2015NewLine            Func<int,int> delg = (Func<int,int>)ares.AsyncDelegate;Di2015NewLine            int res = delg.EndInvoke(asyncRes);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("[{1}] Result = {0}", res, Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16343354Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static ConcurrentDictionary<string, myRule> ccDict= new ConcurrentDictionary<string, myRule>();Di2015NewLine       tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (ccDict.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Parallel.ForEach(ccDict, pOptions, (KVP, loopState) =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //This is the flag that tells the loop do exit out of loop if a cancellation has been requestedDi2015NewLine                    pOptions.CancellationToken.ThrowIfCancellationRequested();Di2015NewLine                    processRule(KVP.Key, KVP.Value, loopState);Di2015NewLine                }); //End of Parallel.ForEach loopDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(ex.Message.ToString());Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static int processRule(string rId, myRule rule, ParallelLoopState loopState)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (rId == "001" || rId == "002")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (rId == "001" && ccDict[rId].RetryAttempts == 2)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    operationPassed(rId);Di2015NewLine                    return 0;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                operationFailed(rId);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                operationPassed(rId);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("failed : " + ex.Message.ToString());Di2015NewLine            return -99;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void operationPassed(string rId)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Normal OperationDi2015NewLine        ccDict[rId].RulePassed = true;Di2015NewLine        ccDict[rId].ExceptionMessage = "";Di2015NewLine        ccDict[rId].ReturnCode = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("passed: " + rId + " Retry Attempts : " + ccDict[rId].RetryAttempts.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        rule value;Di2015NewLine        ccDict.TryRemove(rId, out value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static //Creating a file save dialog Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            saveFileDialog1.RestoreDirectory = true;Di2015NewLine            //read and filter the raw dataDi2015NewLine            if (saveFileDialog1.ShowDialog() == DialogResult.OK)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                BinaryFormatter formatter = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine                FileStream output = new FileStream(saveFileDialog1.FileName, FileMode.OpenOrCreate, FileAccess.Write);Di2015NewLine                ;Di2015NewLine                int n = GRID.RowCount;Di2015NewLine                data[] Person = new data[n - 1]; //We have as many records as many rows, rows are added automaticly so we have always one row more than we need, so n is a number of rows -1 empty rowDi2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Person[i] = new data();Di2015NewLine                    //GRID has two numbers in"[]" first numer is an index of column, second is a an idnex of row', indexing always starts from 0'Di2015NewLine                    Person[i].name = GRID[0, i].Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine                    Person[i].surname = GRID[1, i].Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine                    Person[i].city = GRID[2, i].Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine                    Person[i].number = GRID[3, i].Value.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                formatter.Serialize(output, Person);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                output.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void openToolStripMenuItem_Click(object sender, EventArgs e) // Reading a File and adding data to GRIDDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            openFileDialog1 = new OpenFileDialog();Di2015NewLine            if (openFileDialog1.ShowDialog() == DialogResult.OK)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                BinaryFormatter reader = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine                FileStream input = new FileStream(openFileDialog1.FileName, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLine                data[] Person = (data[])reader.Deserialize(input);Di2015NewLine                GRID.Rows.Clear();Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < Person.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    GRID.Rows.Add();Di2015NewLine                    GRID[0, i].Value = Person[i].name;Di2015NewLine                    GRID[1, i].Value = Person[i].surname;Di2015NewLine                    GRID[2, i].Value = Person[i].city;Di2015NewLine                    GRID[3, i].Value = Person[i].number;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void closeToolStripMenuItem_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Close(); 16347546Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static decimal ExtrapolateFrom(int f, int s, decimal f1, decimal s2, int value)Di2015NewLine{            Di2015NewLine    return (s2-f1)/((s-(decimal)f)/(value-(decimal)f))+f1;         Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static decimal ExtrapolateFrom(List<Tuple<int, decimal>> table, int value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(table.Count < 2) throw  new Exception("Not enough values to extrapolate from");Di2015NewLine    var result = table.Select((x, i) => new { x, i }).Where(x => x.x.Item1 >= value).Select(x => x.i).ToList();Di2015NewLine    var index = result.Any()? result.First() : table.Count-1;Di2015NewLine    if (index < 1) index = 1;    Di2015NewLine    return ExtrapolateFrom(table[index - 1].Item1, table[index].Item1, table[index - 1].Item2,table[index].Item2, value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var table = new List<Tuple<int, decimal>> ()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new Tuple<int, decimal>(0, 0.0M),Di2015NewLine            new Tuple<int, decimal>(100, 5.0M),Di2015NewLine            new Tuple<int, decimal>(200, 6.0M),Di2015NewLine            new Tuple<int, decimal>(300, 9.0M),Di2015NewLine            new Tuple<int, decimal>(500, 11.0M),Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(ExtrapolateFrom(table, 50));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(ExtrapolateFrom(table, 400));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(ExtrapolateFrom(table, 600));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16366931Di2015UniqueSeparator  bool IsInstanceOfGenericTypeClosingTemplate(object obj, Type genericTypeDefinition){ Di2015NewLine      if(obj == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("obj");Di2015NewLine      if(genericTypeDefinition== null) throw new ArgumentNullException("genericTypeDefinition");Di2015NewLine      if(!genericTypeDefinition.IsGenericTypeDefinition) throw new ArgumentException("Must be a generic type definition.", "genericTypeDefinition");Di2015NewLine      Type type = obj.GetType(); Di2015NewLine      return type.IsGenericType && type.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == genericTypeDefinition;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

16366931Di2015UniqueSeparator  bool IsInstanceOfGenericTypeClosingTemplateOrSubclassThereof(object obj, Type genericTypeDefinition){ Di2015NewLine      if(obj == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("obj");Di2015NewLine      if(genericTypeDefinition== null) throw new ArgumentNullException("genericTypeDefinition");Di2015NewLine      if(!genericTypeDefinition.IsGenericTypeDefinition) throw new ArgumentException("Must be a generic type definition.", "genericTypeDefinition");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Type type = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLine      while ( type != typeof(object) )Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         if(type.IsGenericType && type.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == genericTypeDefinition) Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         type = type.BaseType;Di2015NewLine      } Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

16367662Di2015UniqueSeparator//Dead-simple implementation of ICommandDi2015NewLine    //Serves as an abstraction of Actions performed by the user via interaction with the UI (for instance, Button Click)Di2015NewLine    public class Command : ICommandDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Action Action { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Execute(object parameter)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Action != null)Di2015NewLine                Action();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool CanExecute(object parameter)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return IsEnabled;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool _isEnabled = true;Di2015NewLine        public bool IsEnabledDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _isEnabled; }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _isEnabled = value;Di2015NewLine                if (CanExecuteChanged != null)Di2015NewLine                    CanExecuteChanged(this, EventArgs.Empty);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public event EventHandler CanExecuteChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Command(Action action)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Action = action;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class Command<T>: ICommandDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Action<T> Action { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Execute(object parameter)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Action != null && parameter is T)Di2015NewLine                Action((T)parameter);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool CanExecute(object parameter)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return IsEnabled;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool _isEnabled;Di2015NewLine        public bool IsEnabledDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _isEnabled; {Di2015NewLine            case "0.5":Di2015NewLine            case "1.5":Di2015NewLine            case "2.5":Di2015NewLine            case "3.5":Di2015NewLine            case "4.5":Di2015NewLine 16372995Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static partial class MyExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Task<string> DownloadAsync(this WebClient wc, string url)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TaskCompletionSource<string> tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<string>();Di2015NewLine        DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler completed = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        completed = (s, e) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tcs.SetResult(e.Result);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tcs.SetException(ex.InnerException ?? ex);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                wc.DownloadStringCompleted -= completed;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        wc.Headers[HttpRequestHeader.UserAgent] = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; de; rv:1.9.2.12) Gecko/20101026 Firefox/3.6.12";Di2015NewLine        wc.DownloadStringCompleted += completed;Di2015NewLine        wc.DownloadStringAsync(new Uri(url));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16375999Di2015UniqueSeparatorRetry
16375999Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T Retry<T>(int numRetries, int timeout, Func<T> method)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (method == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("method");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var retval = default(T);Di2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            retval = method();Di2015NewLine            return retval;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (TimeoutException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (numRetries <= 0)Di2015NewLine                throw; // avoid silent failureDi2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(timeout);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } while (numRetries-- > 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return retval;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16379209Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static bool IsNumeric(object input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (input == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("input");Di2015NewLine    string inputStr = input.ToString();Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(inputStr)) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int periodCount = 0; //accept a string w/ 1dec to support values w/ a floatDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return inputStr.Trim()Di2015NewLine        .ToCharArray()Di2015NewLine        .Where(c =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (c == '.') periodCount++;Di2015NewLine            return (Char.IsDigit(c) || c == '.') && periodCount <= 1;Di2015NewLine        })Di2015NewLine        .Count() == inputStr.Trim().Length;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16379595Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic public void ShiftLeft(this byte[] data, int count, bool rol)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if ((count <0) || (count > 8))Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Count must between 0 and 8.");Di2015NewLine    byte mask = (byte)(0xFF << (8 - count));Di2015NewLine    int bits = rol ? data[0] & mask : 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = data.Length - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int b = data[i] & mask;Di2015NewLine        data[i] = (byte)((data[i] << count) | (bits >> (8 - count)));Di2015NewLine        bits = b;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic public void ShiftRight(this byte[] data, int count, bool rol)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if ((count <0) || (count > 8))Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Count must between 0 and 8.");Di2015NewLine    byte mask = (byte)(0xFF >> (7 - count));Di2015NewLine    int bits = rol ? data[data.Length - 1] & mask : 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int b = data[i] & mask;Di2015NewLine        data[i] = (byte)((data[i] >> count) | (bits << (8 - count)));Di2015NewLine        bits = b;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
